title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1 + 2, v1.0.2 + Ryujinx Emu for PC
body:
Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 1 + 2, v1.0.2 + Ryujinx Emu for PC


Genres/Tags: Arcade, Sports, Third-person, 3D
Companies: Vicarious Visions, Activision
Languages: ENG/MULTI7
Original Size: 13 GB
Repack Size: 4.6 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Switch Tony_Hawks_Pro_Skater_1_Plus_2_NSW-VENOM scene release: 12.6 GB
  • Game version is: v1.0.2 (v131072)
  • Ryujinx Switch emulator v1.0.6946 and v1.0.0+0ff380c (Dev. build) are included; use the latter build if you have some problems with 6946 (copy all folders and files from _alt_emu to repack root and replace all files)
  • Switch Firmware v12.0.3 (317 MB) added as a requirement for Ryujinx
  • 60 FPS mod is applied by default; to disable it, remove “game\data\mods\contents\0100cc00102b4000\60FPS\cheats\93A4BFB86BCA2C3D.txt” file
  • 100% Lossless, but NOT MD5 Perfect: encryption was removed for better repack size
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 13 to 4.6 GB)
  • Installation takes 3-5 minutes
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 8.3 GB
  • Language can be changed in emulator settings (Options –> Settings –> System — > System Language)
  • This game currently lags heavily on game videos and on skate arenas when generating shaders. Just roll around a little until all shaders compile for smooth gameplay. Be advised that emulated version still has graphical and other bugs here and there, but in general you can play it without major problems
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 3 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Play Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ & Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 2 in one epic collection, rebuilt from the ground up in incredible HD. All the pro skaters, levels and tricks are back and fully-remastered, plus more.
  • Skate as the legendary Tony Hawk and the original pro roster, plus new pros
  • Skate to songs from the era-defining soundtrack along with new music
  • Hit insane trick combos with the iconic handling of the Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ series
  • Play all the original game modes and go head-to-head with local 2-Player modes
  • Show off your style and creativity with upgraded Create-A-Park and Create-A-Skater features
  • Take your sessions online and compete against players from around the world in Multiplayer modes and leaderboards
  • Break skateboarding boundaries, show off your own style and be part of the next generation of skaters and creators with Tony Hawk’s™ Pro Skater™ 1 + 2.
